name: Grammarly will refund if you cancel within 10 days of a change to the Terms

tosdr.tldr: If you cancel your subscription within 10 days following a change in the Terms, Grammarly will refund you a pro-rated portion of any pre-paid Fees for the affected Services applicable to the cancelled portion of the pre-paid subscription term, if any.
